      • extract

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Object> extract(java.lang.String content,
                                       boolean getAnchor,
                                       boolean getAlt,
                                       boolean getImgTitle)
        Given an HTML string, extract all link anchor texts, and/or img tag 'ALT' attribute texts, and/or img tag 'title' attribute texts.
        Parameters:
        content: - The HTML string to process
        getAnchor: - Whether or not link anchor text should be included in the result.
        getAlt: - Whether or not image Alt attribute text should be included in the result.
        getImgTitle: - Whether or not image Title attribute text should be included in the result.
        Returns:
        List of String with the requested information.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This class is intended to be used by applications. Nonetheless, here is an example.
        Parameters:
        args: - No command line arguments are expected.
